text: (inta napiyitam yar etaic connalum) avar kettuk kolpavarakave irukkirar enakkuri napiyaittunpuruttuvorum avarkalil irukkirarkal; (napiye!) Nir kurum; "(napi avvaru) ceviyerpatu unkalukke nanmaiyakum. Avar allahvai nampukirar; muhminkalaiyum nampukirar; anriyum unkalil iman kontavarkal mitu avar karunaiyutaiyorakavum irukkinrar." Enave evarkal allahvin tutarai tunpuruttukirarkalo, avarkalukku novinai tarum vetanaiyuntu
